div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2208 Palermo (anc. Panormus) environs, 1958 Burial: c. 260 B.C. (Jenkins-Lewis) Contents: c. 80 AR Carthage: decadr. (rev. Pegasus) Disposition: dispersed Tusa Cutroni, Kokalos 1967, pp. 78-9 Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, pp. 35, 130 Possibly from Termini Imerese
